ban.noArgs: Please provide a user to ban! (mention or user id)
ban.serverOwner: Woops, the server owner can not be banned!
ban.notBannable: Woops, I can't ban this member! Please make sure my role is above this member's highest role!
ban.youreBanned: You just got banned from **{0}** by {1}

bassboost.invalidNumber: Please provide a valid number between -8 and 8
bassboost.success: Bass boosted! Please wait a few seconds for the effect to apply

language.lackOfPermissions: Only the server admins can change my language!
language.invalidLanguage: Sorry, but this lang does nto exist or i'm not translated into this language yet!

msgevent.prefix: My prefix in this server is {0}, type {0}help to get a command list!
msgevent.cooldown: Woops, you need to wait 3 seconds between each command!
msgevent.error: Woopsie doopsie, something went wrong! You can find the error right below. If you can't figure how to get around this issue, please go to my support server and report this error!

music.queueEmpty: Woops, nothing is playing right now!
music.noVc: Woops, you have to be in a voice channel!
music.notSameVc: Woops, you have to be in my voice channel!
